ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I wonder, if we got the ship working again, would we leave this place and go back to Cybertron? She wondered if Ramulus even had an answer for that.

::Spears::

"I wonder, if we got the ship working again, would we leave this 
place and go back to Cybertron?"
She wondered if Ramulus even had an answer for that.
